divs: sighting detailsi was walking down 21 and 3rd with my wife and uncle on my way to restaurant when i noticed an odd triangle formation in the sky composed of white orb like things. suddenly this orbs changed positions quickly forming kind of an arm. i was able to catch some of the footage on video(i though i didnt casue they where difficult to see through the camera screen. i have had previous encounters and this was really odd in the middle of the afternoon. after trying to film it and talking they disappeared quickly (vanished). the next day i was watching a ufo show and they showed something similar that happened in england. i posted this in you tube and many people have seen similar things heres the link to the video i cant upload it now since its in my other mac. will upload later though http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=8xdbntyxchu
